attributes.action: For our Country, the NHS and it's Doctor's to practice and accept Complementary Alternative Medicine (CAM). Including food avoidance and natural medicines for many illness's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To observe and investigate our body's leval of natural essentials such as vitamins & minerals. To dispense these and other natural ingredients to aid our body back to 100%.

To use simple and advanced diagnosis methods as used by our native ansesters (i.e. vega testing by profesionaly qualified doctors). 

To accept that simple food avoidance short / long term can improve or cure so called un-curable illness's, including amongst many others, baby colic; mygrains; infertility; cancer; high blood pressure; heart disease; obestity; depression; arthritis; anemia.

Reduce the amount of unnecessary chemicaly modified medicine including intrusive and abusive investigations.

This petition has been inspired by, and to support the work of highly qualified people such as Prof. George Lewith and his research in to Complementry Alternative Medicine (CAM)of which has saved my family and many, many others.
